messages.subject: Kiddo
messages.snippet: I don't dodge guilt and I don't Jew out of paying my comeuppance.
messages.body: I don't dodge guilt and I don't Jew out of paying my comeuppance.

messages.subject: RE: Kiddo
messages.snippet: Can't we just... forget the past?

messages.subject: RE: Kiddo
messages.snippet: That woman, deserves her revenge and... We deserve to die. But then again, so does she. So, I guess we'll just see. Won't we?
messages.body:
That woman, deserves her revenge and...

We deserve to die. But then again, so does she.

So, I guess we'll just see. Won't we?
